title: Vocabulary Collection
description: A collection of vocabulary that can be imported into the vocabulary trainer app

title.description: The title of the collection to be displayed by the app

language_a.description: One ('the first') of the languages of which the vocabulary is.

language_b.description: One ('the second') of the languages of which the vocabulary is.

vocabularies.description: An array of the individual vocabulary objects

language_a.description: The corresponding word in language A. If an answer exactly matches this String it's fully correct.

language_a_regex.description: The regex (JS dialect) to check if an answer is good enough to mark it as correct, in language A.

language_b.description: The corresponding word in language B. If an answer exactly matches this String it's fully correct.

language_b_regex.description: The regex (JS dialect) to check if an answer is good enough to mark it as correct, in language B.
